subject: Re: [junit] New poll for junit
msgSnippet: One answer isn t enough! Idea uses 1.5; During development in the IDE I use 1.5 for JUnit; Eclipse uses whatever I tell it to;  in the IDE I use 1.4 and 1.5
messageBody:
One answer isn't enough!

Idea uses 1.5; During development in the IDE I use 1.5 for JUnit;
Eclipse uses whatever I tell it to; in the IDE I use 1.4 and 1.5 for JUnit;
My current project targets 1.4; The ant scripts use 1.4 for JUnit;

I have JDK's installed from 1.1 through the latest 1.5 patch; I'll
use what the target environment requires, and if JUnit supports it,
so much the better.

Ken

P.S.: I'm OK with JUnit 4.0 targeting JDK 1.5 or better - someday
those 1.3 and early 1.4 projects will die. ;^)



At 14:50 2006-01-19, you wrote:

>Enter your vote today! A new poll has been created for the
>junit group:
>
>Give that JUnit 4 is due out soon, I'm curious as to which JDK
>people currently use.
>
>
>so, which JDK Version do you use JUnit 3.8.1 with?
>
>Thanks
>
>Andrew
>
> o 1.5
> o 1.4.x
> o 1.3.x
> o 1.2.x
> o 1.1.x
